<small>Also see: **<big>[[H7442|רָנַן]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּץ‎</span> **verb** ==run== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (rare); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Zinjirli ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצת‎</span>; = Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְהַט‎</span>; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ([[BDB#W|W]]<sup>SG 47</sup>); compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***râƒu***</u></abbr>, ***be helpful*** (i.e. ***run*** to help?)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָץ‎</span> [[Gen.18.7|Gen 18:7]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַצְתָּה‎</span> [[Jer.12.5|Jer 12:5]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרוּץ‎</span> [[Hab.2.2|Hab 2:2]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֻץ‎</span> [[Job.16.14|Job 16:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫רָץ‎</span> [[Gen.18.2|Gen 18:2]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּר֑ץ‎</span> [[2Sam.18.21|2Sam 18:21]].; 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארוצם‎</span> [[Jer.50.44|Jer 50:44]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (but &lt; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]. Hiph\`il, see below), etc. [see also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצץ‎</span>]; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּץ‎</span> [[2Sam.18.23|2Sam 18:23]]; [[2Kgs.4.26|2Kgs 4:26]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻץ‎</span> [[1Sam.20.36|1Sam 20:36]]; [[Zech.2.8|Zech 2:8]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָרוּץ‎</span> [[1Sam.20.6|1Sam 20:6]] +; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָץ‎</span> [[2Sam.18.22|2Sam 18:22]] +, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצִים‎</span> [[1Sam.22.17|1Sam 22:17]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצִין‎</span> [[2Kgs.11.13|2Kgs 11:13]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:87e»§ 87e</sup>); — 

**1.** ***run***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location [[Gen.18.7|Gen 18:7]]; [[Gen.24.20|Gen 24:20]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.17.12|Num 17:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person [[Gen.24.29|Gen 24:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative), [[1Sam.3.5|1Sam 3:5]]; [[Isa.55.5|Isa 55:5]] (figurative), with hostility, ***against***, [[Job.15.26|Job 15:26]] (figurative), so goat against ram [[Dan.8.6|Dan 8:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person, ***against*** [[Job.16.14|Job 16:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative also [[Josh.7.22|Josh 7:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבֵיתוֺ‎</span> [[Hag.1.9|Hag 1:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָרַע‎</span> [[Isa.59.7|Isa 59:7]]; [[Prov.1.16|Prov 1:16]] accusative of location [[1Sam.20.6|1Sam 20:6]]; [[1Sam.17.22|1Sam 17:22]]; [[1Sam.17.48|1Sam 17:48]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְרַאת‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location ***on*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> II. **2**), ==of horses== [[Amos.6.12|Amos 6:12]], locusts [[Joel.2.9|Joel 2:9]] ***into*** [[Prov.18.10|Prov 18:10]] (figurative); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[1Sam.4.12|1Sam 4:12]], so [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] [[2Kgs.23.12|2Kgs 23:12]] (= ***he went quickly thence***, but text perhaps corrupt, see [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]], and compare **Hiph\`il** below); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי‎</span> person [[2Sam.18.22|2Sam 18:22]]; [[1Kgs.19.20|1Kgs 19:20]]; [[2Kgs.5.20|2Kgs 5:20]]; [[2Kgs.5.21|2Kgs 5:21]]; [[Song.1.4|Song 1:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד‎</span> person [[2Kgs.4.22|2Kgs 4:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> person [[2Sam.15.1|2Sam 15:1]]; [[1Kgs.1.5|1Kgs 1:5]] (both of royal escort, ***out-runners***), [[1Kgs.18.46|1Kgs 18:46]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד‎</span> location), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> of thing [[1Sam.8.11|1Sam 8:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> person accompare [[Jer.12.5|Jer 12:5]] with accusative of way, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹרַֹח‎</span> [[Ps.19.6|Ps 19:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> [[2Sam.18.23|2Sam 18:23]]; [[Ps.119.132|Ps 119:132]] (figurative); as preliminary, + infinitive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְרַאת‎</span> ***run to meet*** [[Gen.18.2|Gen 18:2]]; [[Gen.24.17|Gen 24:17]]; [[Gen.29.13|Gen 29:13]]; [[Gen.33.4|Gen 33:4]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Kgs.4.26|2Kgs 4:26]]; [[Jer.51.31|Jer 51:31]], + finite verb [[Gen.24.28|Gen 24:28]]; [[Gen.29.12|Gen 29:12]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.11.27|Num 11:27]]; [[Josh.8.19|Josh 8:19]] (both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.7.21|Judg 7:21]]; [[Judg.13.10|Judg 13:10]]; [[1Sam.10.23|1Sam 10:23]]; [[1Sam.17.51|1Sam 17:51]]; [[2Sam.18.19|2Sam 18:19]]; [[Ps.59.5|Ps 59:5]] as imperative + imperative [[1Sam.20.36|1Sam 20:36]]; [[Zech.2.8|Zech 2:8]] absolute [[1Sam.20.36|1Sam 20:36]]; [[Isa.40.31|Isa 40:31]]; [[2Chr.23.12|2Chr 23:12]] (see **2 a**), [[Prov.4.12|Prov 4:12]]; [[Prov.6.18|Prov 6:18]] (of feet), of locusts [[Joel.2.4|Joel 2:4]]; [[Joel.2.7|Joel 2:7]] specifically, ***run*** as messenger [[2Sam.18.21|2Sam 18:21]]; [[2Sam.18.22|2Sam 18:22]]; [[2Sam.18.23|2Sam 18:23]] (twice in verse); [[2Sam.18.24|2Sam 18:24]]; [[2Sam.18.26|2Sam 18:26]] (twice in verse), figurative of prophet's activity [[Jer.23.21|Jer 23:21]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s word [[Ps.147.15|Ps 147:15]] figurative of reading smoothly, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרוּץ קוֺרֵא בוֺ‎</span> [[Hab.2.2|Hab 2:2]]. — [[Ps.18.30|Ps 18:30]] = [[2Sam.22.30|2Sam 22:30]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרֹץ‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרֻץ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרוּץ‎</span>), √<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצץ‎</span> [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others 

**2.** ***Participle*** as substantive: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרָצִים‎</span> ***the runners*** properly ***out-runners***, as royal escort, compare verb [[2Sam.15.1|2Sam 15:1]]; [[1Kgs.1.5|1Kgs 1:5]] then) of royal body-guard [[1Sam.22.17|1Sam 22:17]]; [[1Kgs.14.27|1Kgs 14:27]]; [[1Kgs.14.28|1Kgs 14:28]] (twice in verse) = [[2Chr.12.10|2Chr 12:10]]; [[2Chr.12.11|2Chr 12:11]]; [[2Chr.12.28|2Chr 12:28]], [[2Kgs.10.25|2Kgs 10:25]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.11.4|2Kgs 11:4]]; [[2Kgs.11.6|2Kgs 11:6]]; [[2Kgs.11.11|2Kgs 11:11]]; [[2Kgs.11.19|2Kgs 11:19]] (twice in verse). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרָצִין (הָעָםׅ‎</span> v[[2Kgs.11.13|2Kgs 11:13]] is gloss ([[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]; whence [easier] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרָצִים‎</span> [[2Chr.23.12|2Chr 23:12]] see **1**). — [[Prov.29.6|Prov 29:6]] for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֻן‎</span> [[BDB#Pinsk|Pinsk]] Toy favour <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרוּץ‎</span>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***runner*** = (royal messenger, post, late), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָץ‎</span> [[Jer.51.31|Jer 51:31]] (twice in verse) (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַגִּיד‎</span>), compare [[Job.9.25|Job 9:25]] (as swift); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרָצִים‎</span> [[2Chr.30.6|2Chr 30:6]]; [[2Chr.30.10|2Chr 30:10]]; [[Esth.3.13|Esth 3:13]]; [[Esth.3.15|Esth 3:15]], riders <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּסּוּסִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָר‎</span> [[Esth.8.10|Esth 8:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹבֵי הָרֶכֶשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָר‎</span> v[[Esth.8.14|Esth 8:14]]. **Po\`lel** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרוֺצֵ֑צוּ‎</span> [[Nah.2.5|Nah 2:5]] ***they run swiftly, dart*** (like lightning; of chariots). **Hiph\`il** ***cause to run:*** 

**1.** ***bring***, or ***move, quickly, Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרִיצֻהוּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[Gen.41.14|Gen 41:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), read perhaps also 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּרֶץ‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.12|2Kgs 23:12]] (accusative omitted; for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּרָץ‎</span> see **Qal**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, accusative of thing omitted <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּרִיצוּ‎</span> [[2Chr.35.13|2Chr 35:13]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרֵץ‎</span> [[1Sam.17.17|1Sam 17:17]] (+ accusative of location, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person); ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּרִיץ יָדָיו‎</span> [[Ps.68.32|Ps 68:32]] ***quickly stretch out*** hands, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵאלֹהִים‎</span> (namely, with offerings). 

**2.** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> = ***drive away from***, 1 singular, suffix 3 masculine singular, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרִיצֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Jer.49.19|Jer 49:19]], so read probably also in \|\| [[Jer.50.44|Jer 50:44]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרִיצֵם‎</span>, &gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארוצם‎</span>).
